title: Casual Games Publisher GameTop.com Moves Headquarters to Singapore
text:
Popular casual games publisher GameTop.com has changed the company headquarters from the United States to Singapore in mid-2015. With the new focus, gamers in the region and around the world can enjoy downloadable full-version games for free.
Singapore (PRWEB) September 08, 2015
The move allows GameTop to become more widely known in the company’s key target markets. While one of the firm’s largest markets is in Indonesia, there are still a great number of game players who aren’t aware of GameTop services and the benefits the company provides.
“ GameTop – stop paying for games,” said GameTop CEO, Sergey Eliseev.
The company’s operation is online and it enjoys a worldwide audience, but the move allows GameTop to create better gamer retention and attain better conversion rates. GameTop is a major player in the downloadable casual game markets and the transition enables the company to secure a bigger share of the market through name-related and organic searches.
Gaming is one of the most popular pastimes for people of all ages and Eliseev is taking gaming enthusiasts to new realms through the firm’s gaming platform. The firm offers games for children, teens and adults, with new games being added as quickly as they become available. Game selections can be downloaded and played without charge for as long as individuals choose.
The site provides downloadable games in every genre, from casual matching games, intensive and interactive war games, to the most addictive games ever developed. Players can choose from games designed for PC, Mac, iPad, iPhone and Android operating systems.
Categories encompass puzzle, hidden object and action games, along with sim and farm, arcade, sports and card games. GameTop provides visitors to the site with videos, screenshots and descriptions to assist individuals in choosing the games that best meet their interests. Children can play fun learning games while parents save the world from zombies.
The firm specializes in the downloadable game market and GameTop takes great care to ensure the company’s roster of games is without viruses and safe for download. The company’s games are fully-featured versions and contain no annoying ads, enabling gamers around the globe to download, play and enjoy their favorite type of gaming entertainment.
GameTop specializes in downloadable games, casual games to accommodate an extensive variety of tastes and preferences. Purchasing new games can be cost prohibitive. GameTop enables adults to enjoy their favorite gaming pursuits without breaking the bank and provides a convenient resource for children’s games that grows with them as their tastes change and develop.
The entrance of GameTop into the online gaming scene offers game players with one of the best opportunities available to play old favorites and try new offerings. GameTop specializes in casual games and free games for hours of entertainment on a platform that’s revolutionizing the way people enjoy gaming.
About GameTop
GameTop is an online platform featuring free, fully-functional, downloadable games in multiple genres. Games are available for children and adults in Windows, Android, iPad, iPhone and Mac operating systems.
